overview.text: The Churah Lakes Circuit is a rare high-altitude Himalayan expedition that takes you far beyond commercial trekking routes. Hidden deep within the Churah Valley, this trail reveals sacred sapphire-blue lakes, vast alpine meadows, glacial streams, and dramatic mountain panoramas. Designed for seasoned trekkers, this journey blends physical challenge, cultural immersion, and raw wilderness—offering an authentic Himalayan experience untouched by mass tourism.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Acclimatization
itinerary.description: Arrive at Chamba and settle into the Himalayan rhythm. A detailed expedition briefing follows, including safety protocols and gear checks. Enjoy a short acclimatization walk through nearby villages to help your body adapt to altitude.

itinerary.title: Into the Deodar Forests
itinerary.description: Drive from Chamba to Tissa, the gateway to the Churah Valley. Begin trekking through dense deodar forests with gradual ascents, ending the day at Bhanodi. Overnight stay in high-quality alpine tents under starlit skies.

itinerary.title: Alpine Meadows & Glacial Streams
itinerary.description: Ascend beyond the tree line into sweeping alpine meadows surrounded by towering peaks. Cross icy glacial streams and witness dramatic Himalayan landscapes before setting up camp in a pristine high-altitude basin.

itinerary.title: Sacred Lakes & Panoramic Views
itinerary.description: A challenging yet rewarding day as you climb to the highest point of the expedition at 4,200 meters. Explore the three sacred Churah Lakes, revered by locals, and soak in panoramic views of the Pir Panjal and Zanskar ranges before descending to High Camp.

itinerary.title: Descent & Celebration
itinerary.description: Descend through scenic valleys and retrace the trail back to civilization. Share stories, laughter, and a final celebratory dinner in Chamba before departing with unforgettable memories of the Himalayas.

inclusions.title: Nutritious Mountain Meals
inclusions.description: All freshly prepared vegetarian meals from basecamp to basecamp.

inclusions.title: Premium Camping Equipment
inclusions.description: Four-season tents, insulated sleeping bags, and comfortable sleeping mats.

inclusions.title: High-Altitude Safety
inclusions.description: Oxygen cylinders, first-aid kits, and trained support staff.
